summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3852 for the improvement of 32nd Avenue West, from Government Way to Emerson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading the same under Ordinance No. 47174, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
